Serialized Form

  • Package verlierer

    • Class verlierer.Main extends acm.program.GraphicsProgram implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • gobj

          acm.graphics.GObject gobj
          The GObject gobj is used to see which image is chosen and clicked by the player. The selection String is used in order to see and tell the player what decision they made.

          java.lang.String selection

        • open

          Opening open

        • plot

          Plot plot

    • Class verlierer.MiniGame extends acm.program.GraphicsProgram implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • checkpoint1

          acm.graphics.GOval checkpoint1
          The GOvals for the checkpoints needed in the game. The GObject is the image of the skater that is controlled by the player. The Gimage is used for the background image that resembles an ice skating rink. The GRect is for the pop-up question box that holds the questions on the language for the player. The language chosen at the beginning will be continued in the minigame. The final GLabel is created as the correct answer to the question in the popup box.

        • checkpoint2

          acm.graphics.GOval checkpoint2
          The GOvals for the checkpoints needed in the game. The GObject is the image of the skater that is controlled by the player. The Gimage is used for the background image that resembles an ice skating rink. The GRect is for the pop-up question box that holds the questions on the language for the player. The language chosen at the beginning will be continued in the minigame. The final GLabel is created as the correct answer to the question in the popup box.
